scripts.build:nodes: cargo build --workspace --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && rm -rf ./app/static/nodes/max/plantarium/ && mkdir -p ./app/static/nodes/max/plantarium/ && cp -R ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm ./app/static/nodes/max/plantarium/
scripts.build:node: cargo build --package float --package output --package math --package nodarium_macros --package nodarium_utils --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && rm -rf ./app/static/nodes/max/plantarium/ && mkdir -p ./app/static/nodes/max/plantarium/ && cp -R ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm ./app/static/nodes/max/plantarium/
